name: Knot Bow Headband
description:
THIS STORE HAS NOW MOVED!
To see The Libertarian's full collection of headpieces visit: www.thelibertarian.co.uk

A statement freestanding bow made with soft black leatherette.

Sits on a black headband. 

Care: wipe clean with a damp cloth. Keep away from fire.

name: Champagne Pyramid Fascinator -choose your own colour
description:
THIS STORE HAS NOW MOVED!
To see The Libertarian's full collection of headpieces visit: www.thelibertarian.co.uk

An updated version of a Libertarian classic hat!

A desirable pyramid of sparkling champagne cocktails sit on a perched sinamay tray. As this piece is made to order, you can choose the colour of your cocktails, sinamay tray and glitter to match your outfit. 

The fascinator sits on a discreet gold or silver headband with hair comb for easy and secure styling.  

This piece is made to order and will be dispatched within two - three weeks. If you require your fascinator sooner please contact Jayne before placing your order.

© The Libertarian. All rights reserved

name: The Chip Hat!
description:
THIS STORE HAS NOW MOVED!
To see The Libertarian's full collection of headpieces visit: www.thelibertarian.co.uk

Handmade light weight chips (not edible!) spill out from a special “Libertarian edition” newspaper hat. 

The Libertarians Chip chronicle newspaper is printed onto cotton to create the hat and includes some interesting “chip” themed articles. 

Sits on a discreet silver headband.  

This piece is made to order and will be dispatched within two to three weeks. If you require your fascinator sooner please contact Jayne before placing your order.

As this piece is made to order, the newspaper article can be personalised if desired (there will be an extra charge for this service)

© The Libertarian. All rights reserved

name: Hand Painted Zebra Fascinator
description:
THIS STORE HAS NOW MOVED!
To see The Libertarian's full collection of headpieces visit: www.thelibertarian.co.uk

Hand painted onto leather, these zebras are a great monochrome fix for this summer. The reverse side of the fascinator has also been hand painted identically. 

Wired for slight angle adjustment, and sits on a silver discreet headband.


This piece is made to order so please allow 2-3 weeks for delivery, however if you need this piece sooner please just get in touch as it may be possible to work to a smaller time frame.  

Slight changes may be made to the design on request such as a change in colour.

name: Audrey Diamante Turban
description:
THIS STORE HAS NOW MOVED!
To see The Libertarian's full collection of headpieces visit: www.thelibertarian.co.uk


Inspired by the glamorous turbans of the 1950s, this fleece headband features a vintage style diamante clasp. The band is made of twisted strips of black luxe fleece and is named after the iconic film star Audrey Hepburn.


Care: hand wash with care.
